q: The decision for Larry Page to take off the CEO training wheels comes at an auspicious moment in the history of Google. I won't overdramatize this step by saying "Google is at a crossroads" or The company's future hangs in the balance. But at no time since the Google juggernaut began its conquest of the Internet have their been so many doubts being raised about the company's future. WASHINGTON: If the memoir of Donald Rumsfeld , among the most powerful and controversial secretaries of defense, catches on with readers and critics, he could cite one of his many " Donald Rumsfeld 's Rules:" The harder I work, the luckier I am. Spy"/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said. "It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body."
